shortDescription.default: Interactive Timeline View - Manage team trips with a responsive Gantt-style timeline display.

longDescription.default:
The Timeline View web part provides an interactive Gantt-style timeline for team trip management. Features include:
- Customizable zoom levels (5-30 pixels per day) for flexible date range visualization
- Fixed task owner column with synchronized scrolling
- Filter tasks by start date
- Responsive grid layout with dynamic header dates and vertical grid lines
- Add and manage tasks directly from SharePoint
- Context menu for task operations (edit, delete)
- Smooth animations and intuitive controls

features.title: Gantt Feature
features.description: The feature that activates elements of the gantt solution.
